H0.text: What word is used to describe someone within an organisation who leaks information. Informant

H1.text: What word is used to describe someone within an organisation who leaks information. Whistleblower

H2.text: What word is used to describe someone within an organisation who leaks information. Spy

H3.text: What word is used to describe someone within an organisation who leaks information. Mole

A4.text: The word began to be used by journalists in the 1960s for people who revealed wrongdoing, such as Nader. It eventually evolved into the compound word whistleblower.

A5.text: Whistleblowing (also whistleâ€‘blowing or whistle blowing) is the activity of a person, often an employee, revealing information about activity within a private or public organization that is deemed wrongful.
